评论概述: Top is a bit blousy and different fabrics between sizes
评论详情: I ordered this in a size L and XL. I'm 5'6", 40" bust/32" waist/40" hips. This is a very nice item and can be dressed up or down. The size L was the right size although the top is pretty blousy; almost a size larger than the fit of the bottoms. What I found strange was the fabric was not the same between the two sizes - they're both a medium weight fabric but the L is a stretchy silky/slinky feel and the XL is a stretchy crepe feel. I honestly prefer the crepe feel/look and am trying to decide if I'll keep the item since the XL is too large and I'm not sure how much I like the fabric of the L.

I ordered this one piece in a dark blue, size medium. I’m 5’4, 135 lbs. It fits well. I chose this to have on hand for a wedding or a funeral. It is classic, nice looking and dignified, appropriate for lots of events. It has a matching belt that is not attached but has loops. I may also wear it with a Leopard print belt also from Amazon. Good buy. I’m curious about the Apricot color as well. Four stars only because I have not worn or laundered it as yet. Just tried it on.
